amendment.description: Amendment sought to create a pilot program for reduction of department-owned vehicles and increase in use of ride-sharing services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 24 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to create a pilot program for reduction of department-owned vehicles and increase in use of ride-sharing services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Schweikert to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
